member.name: T:CityWeather.CityWeatherContext
member.summary: Database is made with the help of LocalDB. To first initialize the database: -- Make sure you have the right reference in the 'App.config' file -- Using Visual Studio, go to 'View' -> 'Server Explorer' -> Right click on 'Data Connections' -> 'Add Connection' -- in the 'Server Name' field, paste following '(LocalDb)\MSSQLLocalDB' -- in the 'Select or enter a database name' choose 'CityWeather.Model' -- Confirm by clicking ok. Your local database should be set up.
Context needed for the database made using Entity Framework Code First approach.

member.name: T:CityWeather.CityDB
member.summary: Database class made using Entity Framework Code First approach. Holds City' Names and assigns them unique ID.

member.name: M:CityWeather.MainWindow.createListToDisplayCurrentWeather(System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable{CityWeather.CityDB})
member.summary: Function that create list of current weather information for all cities stored in database.
member.param: Query that returns every city in database.
member.returns: Returns list of CityCurrentWeather obiect which provides all necessary weather data.

member.name: M:CityWeather.MainWindow.createForecastToDisplay(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Function that gives weather forecast for specific city, for derermined number of days.
member.param: City name for which the forecast will be found.
member.returns: Returns CityForecast obiect which provides all necessary forecast data.

member.name: M:CityWeather.MainWindow.refreshCurrentWeather
member.summary: Function that refresh state of cities list. Must be called after changing cities database in order to display updated data.

member.name: M:CityWeather.MainWindow.updateForecastUI(CityWeather.CityForecast)
member.summary: Function updates user interface wich display selected city's forecast. Function provides binding items source to take data from.
member.param: CityForecast obiect that provides forecast data for city.

member.name: M:CityWeather.MainWindow.changeChartData(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Function that allows display diffrent data on char.
member.param: The path to the data that are intended to display.

member.name: T:CityWeather.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Silnie typizowana klasa zasobów do wyszukiwania zlokalizowanych ciągów itd.

member.name: P:CityWeather.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Zwraca buforowane wystąpienie składnika ResourceManager używane przez tę klasę.

member.name: P:CityWeather.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Przesłania właściwość CurrentUICulture bieżącego wątku dla wszystkich przypadków przeszukiwania zasobów za pomocą tej silnie typizowanej klasy zasobów.
